meanings.definition: The skill or practice of participating in outdoor activities.
meanings.sent1: His outdoorsmanship was evident as he effortlessly set up the tent.
meanings.sent2: She developed her outdoorsmanship by going hiking every weekend.
meanings.sent3: His lack of outdoorsmanship showed when he got lost on a short trail.
meanings.sent4: Her outdoorsmanship was like a well-oiled machine, smoothly navigating the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The camp counselor's outdoorsmanship inspired the kids to explore nature with confidence.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being adept at outdoor pursuits.
meanings.sent1: Their outdoorsmanship shone through during the survival skills challenge.
meanings.sent2: Growing up in the countryside, she naturally possessed great outdoorsmanship.
meanings.sent3: His outdoorsmanship was so impressive that even the squirrels seemed impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her outdoorsmanship was a beacon of expertise in the world of outdoor sports.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's outdoorsmanship was legendary, with tales of his adventures spreading far and wide.
